name: Data Engineer
description:
We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to our BI team of 6 people.

Requirements:

  • Experience with Google Cloud Platform or AWS/Azure
  • Experience with different datasources: DB/API/filesystem/web sraping
  • Strong Python/Go skills
  • Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
  • ETL tools like Stitch/Pentaho
  • Workflow data management tools DBT/Airflow
  • Experienced Linux user
  • Upper intermediate/Advanced English for communication with stakeholder

As a plus:

  • Containerisation and orchestration tools Docker/Kubernetes
  • Experience with developing services (Django, Flask, Nginx)

What you'll be doing:

  • Develop, maintain and improve data model
  • Implement and improve ETL pipelines
  • Adding new data sources
  • Maintain and develop current monitoring and alerting system
  • Support data analysts and data scientists for scaling existing models

What we offer:

  • An awesome highly motivated, growing, diverse multinational team
  • Possibility to work with complex and interesting company products
  • Extended work leave - 29 days
  • 100% sick pay
  • Medical insurance
  • English courses (currently online)
  • Possibility to regulary attend conferences and external trainings and learn even more new and useful for professional development
